description: A $short_summary is requested by the Defense Department to be delivered to Canada. The requested delivery date is March 25, 2025.
full_summary:
# Laboratory HVAC System Tender Notice

## Notice Details

* **Tender Title**: Laboratory HVAC System (Système de CVC de laboratoire)
* **Reference Number**: cb-193-16930241
* **Publication Date**: November 21, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: December 17, 2024, at 2:00 PM (EST)

## Tender Status

* **Tender Status**: Open
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive – Open bidding (Concurrentielle – Invitation ouverte à soumissioner)
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price (Prix le plus bas)

## Contract Details

* **Contracting Entity**: DND QETE 5 (MDN, CETQ 5)
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 45 Sacré-Cœur Blvd, Gatineau, QC J8X 1C6, Canada
* **Contact Information**:
	+ Name: Viktoria Melnichuk
	+ Email: [viktoria.melnichuk@forces.gc.ca](mailto:viktoria.melnichuk@forces.gc.ca)
	+ Phone: (613) 302-1534
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
* **Regions of Delivery**: Canada

## Tender Description

The Department of National Defence is seeking a Laboratory HVAC System, which includes a single unit, to be delivered by March 25, 2025.

## Request for Proposal Documents

* English: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/52398/w8486-250019_rfp_hvac_system_en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/52398/w8486-250019_rfp_hvac_system_en.pdf)
* French: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/52398/w8486-250019_ddp_systeme_cvc_fr.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/52398/w8486-250019_ddp_systeme_cvc_fr.pdf)
